quotes.quote: Once you know what your own personal “weird spending” is, you’ll be able to make choices that align with the things you really want – and that’s a great thing
quotes.author: Desirae, Half Banked

quotes.quote: Budgeting has only one rule: Do not go over budget
quotes.author: Leslie Tayne

quotes.quote: Balancing your money is the key to having enough
quotes.author: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.quote: No one should ever feel like they can’t find a way to make their money work for them
quotes.author: Alyssa, Mixed Up Money

quotes.quote: Defend your money by spending in accordance to your values and things that make you feel good each day of your life
quotes.author: Kara, Bravely Go

quotes.quote: The more we share, the better off we'll all be
quotes.author: Cait Flanders

quotes.quote: We achieve freedom by focusing on the ways in which we can read the system and use it to our advantage, by educating ourselves about money, and by putting plans into action
quotes.author: Amanda, Dumpster Dog

quotes.quote: Sometimes the only thing separating you from a poorer but equally talented, driven, and worthy person is an accident of birth
quotes.author: Bitches Get Riches
